title: Sell Whisky Broker Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Whisky Broker Casks & Bottles | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Whisky Broker bottles. We buy the single cask releases from this cult favorite independent bottler.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Whisky Broker single casks.
introParagraph: Whisky Broker (Martin Armstrong) is known for no-nonsense packaging and incredible value liquid. Often minimal labels, these bottles conceal some amazing single casks.
conditionFactors: Label: Very basic paper labels. Dents/tears are common but less critical than big brands.
Provenance: Since labels are easily replicated, we check provenance carefully.
pricingFactors: Distillery: Whisky Broker bottled a lot of Littlemill and Caperdonich before prices skyrocketed. These are gems.
Age: High age grains (Invergordon, Port Dundas) are common and desirable.
Value: These were cheap at retail, so offers reflect the secondary market growth.

faqs.question: Why is the label so plain?
faqs.answer: To keep costs down. It is all about the liquid.

faqs.question: Do you buy casks held at Whisky Broker?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can arrange cask transfers. Contact us directly.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 'Zoo' series?
faqs.answer: Yes, the ones with animal labels.

faqs.question: Is this brand valuable?
faqs.answer: Collectors love it because it is unpretentious and tasty. Specific distilleries trade well.

faqs.question: Do you buy bulk lots?
faqs.answer: Yes, varied cases of Whisky Broker are welcome.
